Ultra Endurance

Home Journal Gear List Route Gallery

Welcome to my website dedicated to ultraendurance cycling and my experience participating in the TransAtlanticWay race. I have always been drawn to the toughest and most rewarding challenges in the world of endurance sports, and the TransAtlanticWay race is a prime example of this. Covering an epic 1687km from Derry to Cork along some of Ireland's most scenic and remote landscapes, it was an unforgettable experience.

On this website, I share my experiences of participating in the TransAtlanticWay race, including insights into the preparation, training, and gear required for such an epic undertaking. I also provide information and resources for anyone interested in learning more about ultraendurance cycling, bikepacking, or the TransAtlanticWay race itself.

Whether you're a seasoned endurance athlete or simply curious about the world of ultraendurance cycling, I invite you to explore my site and discover the unique thrills and challenges of this incredible sport.
